website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch organic mouthwash that does more than keep your breath fresh and clean.
pros: Cool, minty flavor leaves a refreshing sensation
Naturally moistens gum tissue for long-lasting, effective results
Contains soothing herbs, cinnamon and other natural ingredients that have been shown to support tissue and gum health
cons: Fresh breath is short-lived after use
Mouthwash has a strong, pungent smell

customer_reviews.title: No bleeding gums!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a dentist, but have had lots of trouble with my gums bleeding for over 30 years. I have been using this product for three weeks now and then went to the dentist...NO BLEEDING GUMS for the first time in my life!
customer_reviews.author: SJelly

customer_reviews.title: PerioBrite is awesome and contains clove oil.
customer_reviews.text: So this has a use for those of use with gum-line sensitivities and that is not only as a daily mouthwash, but a tonic for the gums - and because of clove oil, it has a gentle proven analgesic effect - so it can help you deal with sensitivities; other than that my recommendations (besides seeing a dentist regularly) would include daily hygiene (brushing, flossing), and one of the many two-part chlorine dioxide mouthwashes as well (there are many to choose from). Supplements can help too such a lipsomal CoQ10 and liposomal Vitamin C.
customer_reviews.author: Barry J Bolling

customer_reviews.title: BURNING TONGUE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate this mouth wash for being a more natural alternative to others, but it is for the most part unusable for us. The first time I tried to rinse with it, it felt like my taste buds burnt off. I could not stand it and spit it out. I did not regain taste until the next day, and the burning continued after I rinsed with water multiple times. It was miserable!
customer_reviews.author: Winterstream

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works
customer_reviews.text: My Dental Hygeinist asked me if I had been doing anything new in my oral care this last time I went in for a cleaning. I told her about my using Perio Wash for the last few months. She was quite amazed and said that my plague buildup was almost nonexistent. She wrote down the name and said she is going to recommend it to her patients. This is a great rinse.
customer_reviews.author: cid

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: Before going to Weleda toothpaste and Periowash, I had just used Colgate toothpaste and the Act brand of mouthwash my dentist had suggested for years. My mouth had been unhappy about this for awhile, with tender gums and bleeding more often than not. After about a week of using Waleda and Periowash, that has all changed for the better. The Periowash tastes great, very fresh, and you can just feel it doing all kinds of good things for your mouth as it gets swished around. I'd highly recommend this to anyone trying to steer clear of alcohol based mouthwash.
customer_reviews.author: lisa s

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for a healthy mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: I had done some dental implants and was looking for a mild yet effective mouthwash. Not the one with alcohol and chemicals. This was an ideal solution for my dental surgery. It was not bad tasting and it assists in the recuperating period. But I am so hooked on it that I use it all the time instead of the other brands. I try to get it on specials Looking for a healthier alternative...give this a try
customer_reviews.author: Judith Young

customer_reviews.title: Really Helps Sore Gums
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help ease my bleeding and aching gums and it's really helped. It has a different kind of taste but it isn't bad. Because of the oregano one night I came to bed and my husband asked me if I'd just eaten pizza in the bathroom- haha! It soothes the gums and leaves your breath fresher for longer than just brushing alone. I love this stuff- I only wish it was less expensive or there was some sort of option to buy it in bulk at a discount. It's a small bottle and this isn't eligible for Prime. But between using this and my prescription mouthwash I get about 1 month or 1.5 months from this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shortyspice

customer_reviews.title: Misleading, not the same label that says 'organic herbs' that is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the label on the amazon page shows that this version has organic ingredients. Then there is another picture of a label that shows something entirely different on the same page. That is the one you are getting. As far as I can tell there is no organic ingredients in this bottle despite them advertising this on the first image you click on!
customer_reviews.author: bz

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: This product is not the same formulation as it was previously. I have used this continuously for years. The latest bottle is very obviously different. It is watery and does not seem to really clean my mouth. What is usually very minty now has a very strong cinnamon flavor. Very disappointed about this change.
customer_reviews.author: katrina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Found this first at whole foods and it works great. The taste is natural and acquired after a few uses- I use this morning and night after years of good old Listerine - this stuff is legit Leaves your mouth fresh - reduces gum inflammation or tenderness and teeth sparkling This product along with JASONs ( also on Amazon) are the best natural mouthwashes on the market - not cheap but so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Lost In Life

customer_reviews.title: Perfect non toxic mouth rinse
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with the mouth rinse, I’ve recently tried to find non toxic products for our household and when I found this I was very pleasantly surprised! It taste great and actually does work (better) than your everyday Listerine etc. If you want to incorporate a healthy option for a mouth rinse I would def try this out
customer_reviews.author: christina viquez

customer_reviews.title: Makes Me Feel Good
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to do small things that are good for me, non alcoholic toothpaste, deodorant and now a better mouthwash. I can taste the herbs in the bottle and the Coolmint refreshes my mouth. I no longer have to worry about my mouth burning, this mouthwash is the business. It doesn’t last as long as a bottle of Listerine or Scope, but the things that are better for you is always less in quantity and more dollars
customer_reviews.author: Readers Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me, but my wife likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My last review was hidden by a "sensitivity filter". "Tastes like a dirty ashtray. Product gets trapped between the top & bottle, and spills out when the top is removed" - that was the entire review. Turns out my wife likes the product, so I'm getting some more. I transfer the product to another bottle to avoid the leaky cap.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product and cannot return
customer_reviews.text: I received a bottle with damaged seal and mouthwash was leaking... but have no option for a refund/return. Will not be using again, and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: In love with this mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough! I thought bc it was mainly natural ingredients that the breath freshening aspect would fall short. It so has not. It's minty and keeps my mouth fresh. I've noticed a definite change in my oral health! I use it twice a day so in going to have to get a case soon lol. Would definitely buy again and I HAVE recommended it to people. It was recommended to me!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite mouthwash.
customer_reviews.text: I love using this mouthwash. It's natural and gives my mouth a really clean and fresh feel after using. I use twice a day and I feel like it has helped the health of my mouth overall. My only "complaint" and the reason for only giving it four stars is that since my first purchase of this through Amazon, the price has increased three separate times. It's still cheaper to buy this on Amazon however. I love this mouthwash and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bbb

customer_reviews.title: Good size, all natural, leaves mouth feeling clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this all natural mouthwash..priced well and doesn’t take up a lot of cabinet space like the big listerine bottles. Leaves a fresh clean feel in my mouth and my teeth and noticeably whiter. I will only buy this brand from now on and there are no dyes or alcohol like the name brands
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Can't get past the taste!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and thought this would be my new go to mouthwash. The flavor is so bad that I'm going to have to dump it out and buy something else. Usually strong flavors aren't an issue for me. This may be effective, but you have to be willing to endure it. I love myself too much to use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jstinto

customer_reviews.title: I love this mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouthwash. No harsh alcohol. I made my mouth look and feel great. Kind of a gross brown color and the taste is a bit odd but you do get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Teds Mom

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a mouthwash that wasn't filled with chemicals that I couldn't pronounce and I came upon this one on one of my searches. I've been using it for about 2 weeks and I'm liking it. It tastes good, it does NOT burn the inside of my mouth, and my breath is fresh after using it. The package states that you shouldn't drink water or anything for about 10 mins after use. I also found that instead of 2 small capfuls, that I only need one to get complete coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Pro ShopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting natural mouthwash. I've used other natural mouth washes but some others you didn't get the minty fresh feel as you do with the mass produced ones. This product is great and I like the flavor and the freshness without all the additives..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle...
customer_reviews.text: I have had gum issues for years. Deep pockets and a recommended root canal. In a week, the deep pocket that I was advised would need a root canal is gone. The gum is almost all the way back to where it was supposed to be. I don't know what worked in this bottle, but it fixed an issue I have had for years in a week.
customer_reviews.author: capricorn7nc

customer_reviews.title: Great product. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mouth rinse for the past two years. It has a very strong flavor, but you get used to it. It has helped tremendously with the pain when I got a toothache, and keeps my mouth healthy and fresh! I dont get the dreaded morning breath anymore either!
customer_reviews.author: My Stuff

customer_reviews.title: dental health
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with Nature's Answer Perio-Brite mouthwash. I wasn't using any mouthwash products for a long time because I couldn't find any that did not contain chemicals and natural flavors. When I found this product it answered everything I was looking for. We have been using it for months now, more likely, for over a year, and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: auriela mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: good taste, not for sensitive gums
customer_reviews.text: good taste, may be a healthy choice. it mildly irritated my gums, as soon as I stopped using it, the irritation went away. I have sensitive gums, this is not for me, but I think for some people it'll be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thorne

customer_reviews.title: So fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this mouthwash. I aim to use natural products as much as I can and I was not disappointed with this. It burns a LITTLE if you swish/gargle for 30+ sec, but it's due to the herbs etc in it. Love that this has oregano bc it is so good for health! Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for periodontal disease!  Or anyone's teeth!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has saved my smile! My dentist noticed a difference within a week. No have periodontal disease and this has helped so much. I use the toothpaste too. I would reccomend anyone use it on their teeth
customer_reviews.author: ArrrJay

customer_reviews.title: It brings me more smiles and kisses
customer_reviews.text: After talking to my dentist, I started to look for natural products in the market. This is my third times repurchase. My husband and I enjoy using it together every night. What is greater than you pay for joy and health!
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: My must-have mouth rinse
customer_reviews.text: I have always had tooth and gum problem, but after a daily regimen with PerioBrite, and no longer have the same sensitivities. My only suggestion is that I would love a 3 oz. travel size for the product.
customer_reviews.author: MmeCoeur

customer_reviews.title: Spicy but great
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of us using it love it! My 16 year old came down after 2 days smiling and excited her gum swelling has gone down and teeth whiter. She hates the oregano taste but said it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: chickengirl6

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mouthwash, along with the toothpaste, for several years, and I heartily endorse both of them! This natural, alcohol-free product has helped me maintain a healthy mouth even though for quite some time I had no money to spend on dentistry. The ingredients are not only beneficial, but vital to a high level of oral hygiene. There are no "cosmetic" ingredients here--every one does something valuable to maintain good gums and teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Pat T.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: The taste might be a little weird at first if you're used to Listerine or something similar. I've gotten used to it over the time I've used it and now it just tastes like mint. Also, when I went to the dentist, they noticed significant improvement with my gum health. I like this stuff because it's natural and it seems to do what it's intended to do. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Alternate
customer_reviews.text: Great neutral mint taste. I stop used fluoride a while ago. Add a tighter seal for the cap, a tad leaks if its not sitting straight up. Still a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Tevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this mouthwash. Read reviews and thought, let me try it. I'm soooo glad I did. Works great and doesn't leave a nasty aftertaste. I highly recommend a product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rector

customer_reviews.title: works great for receding gums
customer_reviews.text: My bottom teeth were getting loose from gum recession until I found this product and the gel. If you need a miracle, these products do not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Wysterien

customer_reviews.title: it works but smell badly
customer_reviews.text: purchased it for my bleed gum. It stops my gum pain right away but the smell is really strong and could be too cool because of the mint. I can still smell it several hours later
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wu

customer_reviews.title: It tastes and works like listerine! but a better taste, and no harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: Wow is my mouth fresh after using this. I like the fact that it cleans as well as listerine, but is all natural and herbal based. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Young

customer_reviews.title: Very natural...organic
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are very natural... Very excellent for people who have mouth problems or reoccurring mouth disorders... Much better than your regular high end mouthwash...which are non organic... It aids natural healing to the mouth....& has three flavors...which is great... The stores that I have seen it in are much higher in cost there than on Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Less than expected
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash burns my tongue to the point where it still hurts next morning. I’m not sure which ingredient is causing this? I also don’t notice any difference in my gum health...there are several other mouthwashes I have tried that instantly made a difference, but this is not one!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Like a lot
customer_reviews.text: This mouth wash is wonderful. Little more expensive but without all the bad stuff. My mouth feels so clean and refreshed after.
customer_reviews.author: K.A San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Super Freshy Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to up my oral hygiene game and this mouthwash is definitely staying in my rotation. Alcohol can dry out the gums and my gums seem to be much healthier since I started a gentler routine. I now use only non-sulfate xylitol toothpastes and alcohol-free rinses. However, most alcohol-free, herbal mouthwashes do not give that ka-plow!! freshness my mouth wants, but this one delivers! The Cool Mint makes my eyes water a little, in the best way possible.
customer_reviews.author: M/KLaine

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT !!! BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband found this product for us since we went Floride free it was VERY difficult to find a product that was NATURAL, Floride free and didn't have a odd smell/taste and We LOVE IT! Just ordered our second bottle and our 5 yr old uses it as well and LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Brian Clement from the Hippocrates Institute and he recommended this mouth wash from his monthly free seminars on ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Dr. Brian Clement from the Hippocrates Institute and he recommended this mouth wash from his monthly free seminars on line. The ingredients look terrific and I'm going to show my dentist.
customer_reviews.author: Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: I prefer this product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been a week or so, but my mouth feels great - and I prefer this mouthwash over my usual brand. The bottle is small for the price, but I’m using much less each time. I am also using and liking the toothpaste. I am hoping that these products will continue to be less abrasive and irritating to my teeth and gums. I am very glad I decided to try both! MM recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mouthwash. It is made of natural ingredients unlike Crest and Colgate.
customer_reviews.author: True23456u

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Soo much better than listerine
customer_reviews.text: Spent a long time reviewing different mouthwashes. Love this! Soo much better than listerine. The flavour of the blend is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P.

customer_reviews.title: Very clean fresh breath and mouth all day
customer_reviews.text: I never use mouth wash at all but come on this is made just excahlyyhow I would like a mouth wash to be very organic and very healthy for the mouth
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I can't remember if I read reviews about the taste of this product or not but I don't mind the taste at all. If you use it after you brush you may get a tingling sensation but it's not bad. All you need are two capfuls so this will probably last me for some time. I try to leave it in as long as I can stand to and like it better than store bought mouth wash and will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: B A

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: try with the toothpaste, (I wrote a review there also). I was very impressed. If your having problems with your gums, definitely give this stuff a go! It has significantly improved mine, and I've tried a lot of different products! This one is a keeper for me! Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Sorry - but the taste....
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this, but the taste is ugh. Poured it out.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Best mouth wash I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Good taste. Slight burn to feel like its working but not so strong you cant use it. Lasted a couple months with occasuonal use. Kept mouth fresh for a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lewinski

customer_reviews.title: but I don’t like that I can’t seem to purchase it at the ...
customer_reviews.text: We only use Periobrite mouthwash now, but I don’t like that I can’t seem to purchase it at the same price all the time at Amazon.com and I mean the difference is not by cents but about $3-4 difference
customer_reviews.author: TwinkiesMomo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mouthwash I use! Every time I go for my cleaning I get praised because how little plaque I have. I’m so glad it was added to prime and the price is much cheaper than the health food store I was buying it from.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years. That should tell you something.
customer_reviews.author: J. penn

customer_reviews.title: Cured my toothache
customer_reviews.text: My toothache started to fade within a day of using the mouthwash. Within 2 weeks I was able to chew on that side of my mouth again. This stuff is really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Clock gal

customer_reviews.title: The taste is terrible. How would I know if your product works ...
customer_reviews.text: The taste is terrible. How would I know if your product works longer than crest, act, listerene or the other leading products?
customer_reviews.author: David Keller

customer_reviews.title: Had gums issues; started using this w/Auromere toothpaste & got positive feedback from Dental Hygienists so could work on teeth
customer_reviews.text: Cleans & freshens, seems good ingredients, using for years. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MakeshifT

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mouth cleaning liquid I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Helping get rid of plaque as well as strengthen gums. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: J.South

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients are listed as something other than what I received.. Can I get a refund?
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Good natural mouthwash. Good ingredients. Good flavor. Just a bit pricey for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Aneta

customer_reviews.title: Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mouthwash! It leaves my mouth fresh. I really didn't expect it to because a lot of alcohol-free mouthwash I've used in the past was gross and I didn't FEEL like it was working. Well, this does work. I don't have periodontal disease but I've been wanting extra care for my gums and so far so good. :D My husband says the scent reminds him of ginseng more than cool mint. I love it. We'll be getting this again!
customer_reviews.author: Darling_Starling

customer_reviews.title: A great natural alternative to Listerine.
customer_reviews.text: Our family switched from Listerine with all the junk to this and we haven't looked back. We've been using it for months now! It's not as strong as Listerine, but once you get used to that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Very good mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice mouthwash. It's rare to find something that's good for you to use and taste pretty good at the same time. This mouthwash does that for me. Anything that can help with the healing of your mouth and still taste pretty good is fine with me. I will probably try to order more in the future if the price stays reasonable enough. It's a good product to have and use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: E. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthwash, give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: Makes your mouth feel fresh and really clean. I’m starting to like this better than my regular mouthwash, wish it was in stores local!
customer_reviews.author: Su jr

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use another mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: My gums have improved sooo much after using this product regularly. I like that it doesn't burn. It works so well that I use it by itself in the morning and with brushing my teeth only at night.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Vaught

customer_reviews.title: The outcome and taste
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd order and even though I still have other similar products at home, I am only using this one. I have gum decease and I must say this product made my gums feel much better and healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Inge Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mouthwash for several years and love it. Keep a small container with some of this in your purse or car for a quick "refresher" after lunch, before a meeting, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Karmala

customer_reviews.title: Helps clear the Perio issues.
customer_reviews.text: It tingles and feels far more healthy then other rinses. My hygienist noticed the difference in my gums since I've been use this rinse over any other's I've tried in the past. Just 30 seconds of rinse and the gums are far less able to cause pockets. It's natural ingredients don't leave me with an irritated throat or sinuses. I'm sensitive to chemicals and fragrances and this has none.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. FrostTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthwash for a healthier gums & a fresh mouth!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as scheduled. Great mouthwash! It does taste medicinal, but not bad though. It keeps my mouth fresh and my gums are healthier! I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PerioBrite Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product, that is as long as the price does not get any higher. If it does, I won't use it anymore. With that in mind, i like that it is all natural and feels better then what's on the market on store shelves. It's good for keeping teeth clean and healthy for your gums also. Last Dentist visit they could not find any plague. It makes my gums feel better and healthier. My teeth look great. Helps prevent cavities too. If your in pain, with the oil of clove in it, it really helps. Swish and hold on the gum area to get the maximum effects.
customer_reviews.author: Debgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Love this mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mouthwash & made my mouth feel so clean. But I stopped using it because there was some things in it that my holistic doctor did not agree with it.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good flouride free alternative
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this to anyone looeto switch from conventional mouthwash.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Krummen

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Decided to use this after reading some scary things about normal mouthwashes. It took me a few days to get used to the taste; not at all like standard mouthwash (which is a good thing in my mind). Now I really like the taste, like how it works. I got good reviews last time I went to the dentist too!. It has become a regular item for me.
customer_reviews.author: blackberry

customer_reviews.title: Great, clean product
customer_reviews.text: This makes my mouth feel clean and fresh. I used it after wisdom teeth extraction to help clean the area instead of taking toxic stuff and it worked great and helped me heal up well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised does a fine job leaves me feeling fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Ceco

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for about a week and noticed it had created some type of hard bubble on the roof of my mouth. I never write reviews but I thought this was important to let the public know what happened when I used the product.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Can you say wow ?
customer_reviews.text: Best mouth wash I''ve tried to date. nice on the cheap side when compared with Listerine but never the less, I think it;'s worth the money. My gums have improved quite a bit. I am using this in conjunction with my daily coconut oil pulling. My gums have not been so happy in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Avinator

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product has all the right ingredients to make it high effective. Girlfriend and daughter love it and use it over alcohol based products. I bought 3-5 more just to stock up on at this decent price! You don't need to be a health freak or holistic healer to realize the power of this product. Just read the ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: rpamz

customer_reviews.title: Substitute for Brushing When in a Hurry
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, no need to rinse anything out of your mouth after using. Excellent substitute for brushing your teeth when in a hurry or when you want to go easy on your gums. Full of the kinds of things you'd use on your teeth anyway (like Thieves, Xylitol), but in a formulation that doesn't burn or taste bad. Extremely well formulated!
customer_reviews.author: J. Buss

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mouthwash. Never thought alcohol was a good idea to rinse your mouth with. I always felt like it dried my mouth out and never mind all the chemicals. This stuff tastes great and I feel like I'm doing something good and healthy for my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Couch potato

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: taste isn't great, but wow. It really makes your mouth feel super clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids too!
customer_reviews.text: Really help, my son who is 9 uses just 1 capful and he likes it. Leaves his mouth feeling fresh and smelling good
customer_reviews.author: Lucy robles

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Helps keep my teeth clean & gums healthy.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: This is seriously so good! I usually don't enjoy brushing my teeth but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously so good! I usually don't enjoy brushing my teeth but I actually look forward to using this because it makes my mouth feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: booktay

customer_reviews.title: PerioBrite
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for some time now. I haven't been to the denist for my six month checkup but hoping this product has helped me.
customer_reviews.author: B. McCallister

customer_reviews.title: good taste
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash has a great long lasting taste. This is a pros. I used beside to Nature's Answer Periocleanse Oral Irrigating Conc, 4-Ounce ,but I didn't see many results. Just good taste, and feel clean sensation. For me it's Ok, because is a natural product. I mean more natural then store products.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Nice mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Third time I've bought this -- I've set to up for shipment every few months. Plus point -- contains Xylitol AND does not contain other sugar alcohols like sorbitol that negate the xylitol effect.
customer_reviews.author: Kamesh R Aiyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This product has an odd flavor but nothing I can't deal with. Had some gum irritation. Boy this stuff works so fast. I will continue to use this product I am anxious to see what the response will be at my next dental cleaning per other customer comments
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Meh...Nothing Exciting
customer_reviews.text: Wish it lasted longer. I just didn't get that minty punch I want with a mouthwash. I like other PerioBrite products better.
customer_reviews.author: AzaleaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: HAS HELPED GREATLY WITH MY HOT/COLD SENSITIVITY. I WILL REORDER THIS ITEM!
customer_reviews.author: Harlem girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not strong removes strong odors such as garlic, coffee breath really good
customer_reviews.author: Birdiepla

customer_reviews.title: Your mouth will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Alcohol-free which is what I'd been looking for. The alternative to the commercial based mouthwashes loaded with dyes. Co – Q10 (fantastic for gum tissue--and your heart), Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove support tissue and gum health. Helps dry mouth too!
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: Love this mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mouthwash. It tastes kind of sweet and tingles a little, but my mouth feels really clean after I brush and use this mouthwash. I'm on my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: mattbrat92

customer_reviews.title: Product is very good, not only does it address making your breath ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my package quickly and intact. Product is very good, not only does it address making your breath smell better but also gum issues. I am a repeat buyer of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Murky color
customer_reviews.text: Just got my first bottle. Seems ok but is it supposed to look like murky lake water and a slight kerosene aftertaste? I've been using OralTonin for years and was hoping this would be a good replacement since thd OralTonin is rather expensive. I'll give it a few days but the initial impression was not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Tempus Solo

customer_reviews.title: Been Buying This Mouthwash for Years! Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perio Wash is my favorite mouthwash hands down. It tastes great and has a lot of good stuff in it. Price is reasonable and well worth paying a little more for excellent quality. I have had good results with this product. Try it! You will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Tarot Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Good product will buy agian and agian
customer_reviews.text: Best mouth wash yet leaves my mouth very clean and very nurtured
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Roop

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Although the flavor could be a little more prevelent this item is a very good product. The natural herbs and COq10 and Folic Acid are very good for the teeth and gums.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Great for periodontal issues
customer_reviews.text: My dentist was very happy that I had purchased this product to use between cleanings. It is definitely making a difference, and I will continue using it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Yazoo68

product_meta.title: Natures Answer Periobrite Mouthwash 16 oz
product_meta.description: Flavor:Cool Mint| Size:16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Formulated by a Dentist, Nature’s Answer PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash does more than keep breath fresh and clean, it promotes periodontal health, which is important for a healthy mouth.* In fact, daily cleansing and rinsing with PerioBrite helps promote healthy teeth and gums without the concerns about fluoride, because it’s fluoride free.* Only PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash contains a unique combination of soothing organic wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, together with Co-Q10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove to support tissue and gum health.* It naturally moistens gum tissue for long-lasting results when used as part of an oral health program.* And since PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash is all natural and alcohol free it fights bad breath and relieves dry mouth naturally, energizing your mouth with a cool, sparkling minty-fresh feeling.*
feature_bullets: Fights Bad Breath Naturally with Organic Herbs, CoQ10, Olive Leaf, & Folic Acid
No Sodium-Lauryl-Sulfate, No Artificial Sweeteners or Preservatives, Soy Free, Vegetarian
